userStories.title: Discover all vehicle gallery URLs via make-based pagination
acceptanceCriteria: Extract all make IDs from /gallery page (50+ makes identified)
Paginate through each make's gallery using /gallery/search/{page}/{offset}/?vma={make_id}
Parse pagination info ('PAGE X OF Y') to determine total pages per make
Output unique detail URLs in format /gallery/detail/{id}/{page}/{slug}
Generate urls.json with all discovered URLs
Include gallery ID range and count statistics
userStories.notes: Discovered 4,654 unique URLs across 54 manufacturers using browser-based JavaScript crawling. Gallery IDs range from 49 to 5681. Top sources: Mercedes-Benz (882), Chevrolet (314), Lexus (308), Land Rover (292), BMW (284).

userStories.title: Scrape HTML from all discovered gallery detail pages
acceptanceCriteria: Read URLs from urls.jsonl
Fetch HTML for each detail page using httpx (no browser needed)
Save HTML files to html/ directory named by build ID
Implement 2-3 second delays between requests
Track progress in scrape_progress.jsonl
Handle 404s gracefully (some IDs may have gaps)
userStories.notes: Site serves static HTML, no JavaScript rendering required. Use httpx scraper template. Respect rate limits even though no anti-bot detected.

userStories.title: Extract structured build data from HTML files
acceptanceCriteria: Parse year, make, model from page title (format: 'YYYY Make Model with...')
Extract wheel brand and model from breadcrumb/title
Extract wheel size from page content (e.g., '22" ANRKY XR-301')
Extract trim/variant info if present (e.g., 'TARGA 4 GTS')
Extract wheel specs if available (e.g., '21x9.5 22X12' for staggered setups)
Extract main image URL from gallery/VehicleImage path
Generate deterministic build_id from source URL
Output to builds.jsonl following schema
userStories.notes: Title format is 'YYYY Make Model with SIZE" Brand Wheel-Model in Finish'. Detail pages have trim info in body. Wheel link provides additional specs.

userStories.title: Extract wheel/tire modifications from builds
acceptanceCriteria: Extract wheel brand, model, size, and finish as modifications
Categorize as 'Wheels/Tires' modification type
Link to wheel detail page when available
Include front/rear sizes for staggered setups
Output to mods.jsonl with build_id reference
userStories.notes: This is a wheel/tire focused site - each build typically has 1-2 modifications (wheels and optional tires). Wheel detail link format: /wheel/detail/{wheel_id}/{page}

siteAnalysis.siteDescription: Wheel Specialists Inc (WSI) is a wheel and tire retailer in Tempe, AZ with a gallery of customer vehicle photos showcasing their wheel/tire installations
